Summary: This UFO was much higher than 35,00 feet
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around November 11th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was turning the pool filter on when I noticed a bright blinking light .I thought it was a very bright star.. Upon further investigation with high power binoculars I saw many lights revolving around a craft .The craft changed shapes frequently and darted and dashed around the sky. at one point it was joined by 2 more . I signaled the craft with my pool light and then with a lasar pointer at which point something flew directly over my head {I'd say 12 feet above} so quickly that had I blinked I would have missed it .I watched it for nearly 2 hours when it just blinked and disappeared. This sighting was witnessed by myself and a friend at my home . I also called my friend across town who then went outside and observed the same craft. I felt very excited but also a sense of peace from thsi sighting. as I watch the video over and over it gives me a peace I cannot describe. video and pictures attached. This is my second sighting . My first is documented with Mufon . 1999
